content.div:
HBO continues its teasing campaign for the highly anticipated Game of Thrones Season 2.

As well as releasing a new poster, the network gave fans a video Valentine in the form of a brand new behind-the-scenes feature on this season newest and coldest set: Iceland.

In the video, actors and crew members describe the chilling beauty of the Nordic paradise, which only allowed for four hours of light to film per day.

Watch the full video below:

In Production - Iceland

jond@dose.ca
